Murphy, “Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction”. … Read the rest Ph.D. student Fangda Han’s research linking AI, computer vision, and nutrition was recently featured in a news article by Vice. “These Pizzas Do Not Exist”  highlights the unique computational approach Fangda created to synthesize photo-realistic images of pizzas … Read the rest This is a joint work by Jiatong Li, Fangda Han, Ricardo Guerrero and Vladimir Pavlovic. The paper is accepted by the 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2020). Abstract Increased awareness of the impact of food consumption on health … Read the rest Happy to announce that we have been recently awarded a new NSF grant: Collaborative Research: RI: Medium: Learning Joint Crowd-Space Embeddings for Cross-Modal Crowd Behavior Prediction This $1M grant from the Division of Information & Intelligent Systems / Robust Intelligence … Read the rest Many of us have become better cooks in the past few months. How about cooking your next favorite meal using the power of AI? Try our brand new CookGAN Virtual Cooking demo http://foodai.cs.rutgers.edu and let us know what you think!… Read the rest I’m very glad to have our work CookGAN recognized by the CV/ML community SyncedReview on Medium!
